synopsis.text:
While living a mundane life as a businessman, Tetsuo Tosu's world takes a dark turn when he discovers that his college-going daughter, Reika, has been the victim of domestic abuse at the hands of her yakuza boyfriend, Nobuto Matori. Driven by concern and anger, Tetsuo decides to confront the situation, only to stumble upon Nobuto's sinister plans to exploit and harm Reika further. In a desperate attempt to protect his daughter, Tetsuo ends up killing Nobuto in self-defense.

Now, with the help of his wife, Kasen, Tetsuo must navigate the dangerous underworld to cover up the murder and shield his family from the wrath of the yakuza, who are hot on their trail. As the head of the mafia's son, Nobuto's disappearance doesn't go unnoticed, and the couple must rely on their wits to evade capture and ensure their daughter's safety. Can Tetsuo and Kasen outsmart the syndicate and protect their family, or will their actions lead to even more dire consequences?
